title: KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - ETL Certified Ceramic Portable Heater Fan, Ideal for Home/Dorm/Office/Kitchen, Black; indoor, electric, size: 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13"; weight: 2.6 pounds, three modes: heating 750W, heating 1500W, air circulation; safety: automatically turns off at 45 degrees; delivers heating in 2 seconds, PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient), noise below 45 dB
descriptions:
Stay warm, safe, and comfortable with the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat.

What it is:
- A small, easy-to-use electric heater for indoor spaces like your living room, bedroom, office, dorm, or kitchen.
- Light to carry (about 2.6 pounds) and compact (about 8 inches tall), so you can move it from room to room.

Simple heat choices:
- Low Heat: 750 watts for gentle warmth.
- High Heat: 1500 watts for quick, strong heat.
- Fan Only: moves air without heat for year-round use.

Heats up fast:
- Feels warm in about 2 seconds, thanks to the ceramic PTC heating element.

Easy to use:
- Turn the dial to pick your heat level.
- Built-in thermostat helps keep a steady, comfortable temperature.
- Quiet operation (below 45 dB), so it wonâ€™t disturb sleep or TV.

Safe to use:
- Overheat protection: heater turns off if it gets too hot.
- Tip-over protection: if it tilts or falls (about 45 degrees), it shuts off.
- ETL certified for safety.

Good for small areas:
- Works well in spaces up to about 200 square feet (a small to medium room).

Fits your home:
- Indoor use, black color, neat and modern look.

Size and details:
- Dimensions: 7.72" wide x 6.38" deep x 9.13" high.
- Weight: 2.6 pounds.
- Electric powered, no fuel needed.

How to use (quick steps):
1) Place on a flat, firm surface, away from curtains or papers.
2) Plug into a standard wall outlet.
3) Turn the dial to Low or High heat. Use Fan mode for no heat.
4) Set the thermostat dial to your comfort.
5) When finished, turn it off and unplug.

If you want a small heater that warms quickly, is simple to control, and has strong safety features, the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater is a warm, reliable choice.
